t: Israel Invoked to Praise the Lord.
Praise*pn the Lord!*s Sing*ln to the Lord*s a new song, And*iln His praise in the congregation of the godly ones.
Let*ln Israel be glad in his Maker; Let*ln the sons of Zion rejoice in their King.
Let*ln them praise His name with dancing; Let*ln them sing praises to Him with timbrel and lyre.
For*ln the Lord*s takes pleasure in His people; He*ln will beautify the afflicted ones with salvation.
Let*ln the godly ones exult in glory; Let*ln them sing for joy on their beds.
Let*iln the high praises of God be*i in their mouth, And*ln a two-edged sword in their hand,
To*ln execute vengeance on the nations And*ln punishment on the peoples,
To*ln bind their kings with chains And*ln their nobles with fetters of iron,
To*ln execute on them the judgment written; This*ln is an honor for all His godly ones. Praise*ln the Lord!*s
